archimate:BusinessProcess.name: MAN.5.BP4 Analyze risks
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Analyze risks to determine the priority in which to apply resources to mitigate these risks. NOTE 4: Risks are normally analyzed to determine their probability, consequence and severity. NOTE 5: Different techniques may be used to analyze a system in order to understand if risks exist, for example, functional analysis, simulation, FMEA, FTA etc
